annotations.description: What a thrilling encounter, there was plenty of goal mouth action. The hosts were largely in control of the game today. The strategy of the home side was to control the pace of the match with possession style football. Whereas the strategy of the away side was a bit risky and reliant on solid defending to dispossess the opponent and break fast.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's the end of the match.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's in the back of the net! Chicharito sprays a pass out to Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid), and he has an easy job to slot the ball into an empty net. The score is 3:1.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 3 min. of added time.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Sergi Darder walks off the pitch and Duda (Malaga) comes on as a substitute.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Inaki Vicandi Garrido shows the yellow card to Fernando Tissone (Malaga) for a heavy challenge.
An attempted cross from Marcelo (Real Madrid) is cleared.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Isco (Real Madrid) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.
The ball is cleared after Isco (Real Madrid) attempted to dribble past an opposing player. The ball goes out of play. Real Madrid are awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Ricardo Horta (Malaga) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Samu Castillejo.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) sees a yellow card from Inaki Vicandi Garrido after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: James Rodriguez (Real Madrid) decides to take a short corner instead of crossing into the box.
James Rodriguez (Real Madrid) produces a dangerous low pass into the penalty area, but the defence manage to cut it out. Real Madrid will have a chance to score from a corner kick.
The linesman raises his flag. Chicharito (Real Madrid) is adjudged offside.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Inaki Vicandi Garrido has issued a yellow card to Sergio Sanchez (Malaga).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Carlo Ancelotti has decided to make a change. Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) replaces Alvaro Arbeloa.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Fernando Tissone (Malaga) on for Recio.

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: 12:11 – the total goal attempt statistics.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Juanmi (Malaga) scores a goal! A perfectly produced cross puts him one on one with the goalkeeper and he plants a brilliant header down in the middle of the net, leaving the goalkeeper beaten!

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance for today's match is 78354.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Cristiano Ronaldo slips it to James Rodriguez (Real Madrid) on the edge of the box and he finds the top right corner with a great effort. The score is 2:0.

annotations.label: penalty-missed
annotations.description: Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) fails to convert the penalty kick! His effort hits the left post.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) is going to take the penalty!

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: Inaki Vicandi Garrido blows his whistle for a foul after Samu Castillejo (Malaga) hacks down one of his opponents. The referee gives a penalty kick to Real Madrid!
Arthur Boka (Malaga) wins the ball after the corner kick and takes a shot from the edge of the box, but it's blocked by one of the defending players.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Recio (Malaga) quickly takes the corner kick with a short pass.
Nordin Amrabat (Malaga) plays a through ball which would have led to a great opportunity, if it hadn't been stopped by the defence. The ball is out of play and Malaga manage to earn a corner.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Inaki Vicandi Garrido shows a yellow card to Alvaro Arbeloa (Real Madrid), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The manager has been forced to make a substitution and the injured Luka Modric leaves the pitch to be replaced by Asier Illarramendi (Real Madrid).

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Looks like Luka Modric (Real Madrid) is struggling after picking up a knock. Hopefully he can run it off.
Nordin Amrabat (Malaga) gets a shot from inside the penalty area and it flies just wide of the left post.
Iker Casillas steps in and intercepts a long pass from Nordin Amrabat (Malaga).
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) had a good opportunity when he latched on to a cross from the wing, but his header wasn't accurate at all and the ball went well over the bar.
A long pass, executed by Isco (Real Madrid), missed the precision to reach his teammates.
Half chance! Isco (Real Madrid) plays a pass into the box, but Idriss Carlos Kameni reacts well to snuff out the attack.
Inaki Vicandi Garrido has a clear sight and sees a foul from Marcos Angeleri (Malaga).
Roberto Rosales (Malaga) flights in the cross, but the defender is alert and clears to safety.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Inaki Vicandi Garrido blows his whistle and the second half starts.

We are seeing a great game so far, let's hope the players will be able to sustain their level of performance and keep entertaining the fans in such a fabulous way. The visitors played second fiddle to the home team in the first half. The home team tries to prevail using combination football, while the away teams uses mostly counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has reached half time.

What a poor attempt! Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) drives another shot towards goal this time from further out, but it couldn't have been worse if he had shot blindfolded. The ball goes into the stands.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 1 min. of stoppage time to be played.
Chicharito (Real Madrid) makes a bad challenge and the referee blows his whistle for a foul.
Recio (Malaga) carelessly slides into the feet of his opponent and he'll be lucky to avoid punishment. Inaki Vicandi Garrido blows for the foul but keeps his cards in his pocket on this occasion.
Sergio Sanchez (Malaga) attempts to find one of his teammates with a fine lofted pass, but the defence reacts well to intercept the effort.
Recio (Malaga) unleashes a shot, but his effort is poor and floats high over the bar.
Sergio Sanchez (Malaga) is penalised for holding. Inaki Vicandi Garrido signals a set piece.
Sergi Darder (Malaga) has a great chance to score, but he blasts the ball well wide of the left post.
Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) has a goal ruled out for offside!

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: James Rodriguez (Real Madrid) works the corner short instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away. The ball goes behind for a corner. Real Madrid will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
Gooal! No wait, it's been ruled out for offside. Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) disagrees, but the linesman is sure about his call.
Samu Castillejo (Malaga) gives away a foul for a clumsy challenge. Referee Inaki Vicandi Garrido saw the whole situation. A free kick has been awarded to Real Madrid.
Isco (Real Madrid) fails to pick a body out in the box with an over hit cross to the back post.
Chicharito (Real Madrid) meets a cross from Marcelo, but he cannot keep his header on target. It goes high over the crossbar.
James Rodriguez (Real Madrid) picks up a pass and has an effort from the edge of the box, but Idriss Carlos Kameni gets down to his right to keep it out.
Marcos Angeleri (Malaga) commits a foul during an attacking move.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Cristiano Ronaldo takes the resulting free kick and sends the ball into the six yard box, where Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) has an easy task to slot the ball into the back of the net. 0:0.
Inaki Vicandi Garrido blows his whistle and signals a foul after Roberto Rosales (Malaga) brought his opponent down. Real Madrid have a free kick.
James Rodriguez (Real Madrid) sends a lofted cross into the penalty area. Unfortunately for him, the opponent's defence deals with his cross comfortably and intercepts it.
Samu Castillejo (Malaga) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.
A fine lofted pass into the box, sent by Alvaro Arbeloa (Real Madrid), is intercepted by the opposition's defence.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) launches an inaccurate corner kick into the penalty area.

Chicharito (Real Madrid) latches on to a cross from the free kick and attempts to direct a bullet header into the top of the net. Idriss Carlos Kameni is alert, though, and makes a great save to deny him. Real Madrid will take a corner kick.
The game is interrupted, a clear handball by Roberto Rosales (Malaga). It's a free kick to Real Madrid, but they probably won't attempt a direct shot on goal from here.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Recio (Malaga) steps up to send the ball in.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Recio (Malaga) is cleared by the defence. Malaga have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

Nordin Amrabat (Malaga) takes the ball on and fires in a shot from 22 metres out. Iker Casillas stops the effort which is headed to the roof of the net. The ball is out of play. Malaga win a corner kick.
Alvaro Arbeloa (Real Madrid) delivers a crossfield pass, but the ball is cut out before it reaches its intended target.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) makes a run beyond the last defender, but he's offside.
A long pass, executed by Nordin Amrabat (Malaga), missed the precision to reach his teammates.
Marcelo (Real Madrid) is adjudged to have been offside when making his run.
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) fails to find a teammate across the pitch with a long ball.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Gareth Bale is being substituted because of an injury. Carlo Ancelotti sends Chicharito (Real Madrid) on the pitch.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: The game is interrupted now, Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) picks up a knock and the physio has to come on.
Marcelo (Real Madrid) attempts to send a pass but the effort is blocked.
The players are on the pitch and Malaga will have the kick off.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half has just begun.
Today's referee will be Inaki Vicandi Garrido.

Hello to all football fans, we are here to bring you a live commentary of the following match, describing all the most interesting and important moments. We'll make sure you won't miss a thing, so just sit back and have fun.

The strategy of the home side was to control the pace of the match with possession style football. Whereas the strategy of the away side was a bit risky and reliant on solid defending to dispossess the opponent and break fast.
